submit_onboarding.description: Submit user's financial goals and onboarding data

get_onboarding_status.description: Check if user has completed onboarding

get_expenses.description: Get list of expenses with filters

get_category_trends.description: Get spending trends by category over time

send_message.description: Send a message and get AI response

request.message: I'm spending too much on food. Can you analyze my expenses and give suggestions?

user_message.content: I'm spending too much on food. Can you analyze my expenses and give suggestions?

ai_response.content:
I've analyzed your food spending for the last 30 days, and you've spent $645.50, which is 7.6% over your $600 budget.

Here are some personalized suggestions:

1. **Restaurant spending**: You spent $280 on restaurants (43% of food budget). Consider reducing dining out to 2-3 times per week instead of current 5-6 times.

2. **Meal planning**: Your grocery expenses are actually reasonable at $365.50. Continue this pattern.

3. **Quick wins**: Your coffee shop expenses are $95/month. Brewing at home could save $60-70 monthly.

Would you like me to create a detailed meal planning strategy or help adjust your budget categories?

messages.content: I'm spending too much on food. Can you analyze my expenses?

get_all_sessions.description: Get all chat sessions for user

sessions.title: Budget Review Help
sessions.last_message: Would you like me to create a detailed meal planning strategy?

get_ai_insights.description: Get proactive AI insights based on spending patterns

insights.title: Food spending above budget
insights.message: You've spent 7.6% more than your food budget this month. Consider meal planning to save $45.

insights.title: Potential savings identified
insights.message: You have $1,754 remaining this month. Consider allocating $500 to your Emergency Fund goal.

insights.title: Emergency Fund on track
insights.message: Great job! You're on track to reach your Emergency Fund goal by December 2026.

notifications.title: Food budget exceeded
notifications.message: You've exceeded your food budget by $45.50

notifications.title: Goal milestone reached
notifications.message: Congratulations! You've reached 30% of your Emergency Fund goal

opportunities.title: Unused subscription detected
opportunities.description: You haven't used your Gym membership in 60 days
opportunities.recommendation: Consider canceling or freezing this subscription

opportunities.title: Expensive grocery shopping
opportunities.description: You could save by shopping at budget-friendly stores
opportunities.recommendation: Try shopping at Aldi or Costco for groceries

anomalies.description: Shopping expenses are 200% higher than usual

quick_insights.message: Great! You've saved money for 3 consecutive months
Housing is your largest expense at 46% of spending

delete_account.description: Delete user account and all data

403_FORBIDDEN.INSUFFICIENT_PERMISSIONS: You don't have permission to access this resource

429_RATE_LIMIT.TOO_MANY_REQUESTS: Rate limit exceeded. Please try again later
